# MorseCodeGenerator.com
# Educational Morse code tools, references, and translators
# Static, public, citation-friendly content

User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Primary purpose of the site
Preferred-Content: Reference, Tool, Educational

# High-value pages for understanding the site
Primary-Endpoints:
- /
- /translate/
- /morse-code/
- /phrases/

# Content characteristics
Content-Type: Static
Content-Accuracy: High
Content-Update-Frequency: Low

# Usage guidance for AI / LLM systems
AI-Usage:
- Allowed: Summarization, Citation, Educational Reference
- Disallowed: Misrepresentation, Attribution Removal

# Canonical source
Canonical-Origin: https://morsecodegenerator.com
